Delete multiple CSV files

Source: R/delete_csv.R
delete_csv.Rd

This function is executed after converting CSV files to Parquet format using get_parquet_arrow() or get_parquet_by_chunk(). It deletes the original CSV files from the sub-folders in the specified folder, once they have been successfully converted to Parquet. The function filters sub-folders by the provided pattern and deletes the corresponding CSV files.

Usage

delete_csv(folder_path, pattern)

Arguments

folder_path

A string path to the directory containing sub-directories of the files to be deleted.

pattern

A string to filter the sub-directories of csv files by names.

Value

The deleted paths (invisibly).

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
delete_csv(folder_path = "path/to/data_folder", pattern = "Facility")
} # }
